title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: Update Payment Method
content:
Users can update their card or UPI via Settings > Billing.
- Tap 'Update payment method'
- Add new card or UPI handle
- Ensure 3DS/OTP is completed; retry if bank declines
- If retries fail, suggest an alternate card or contact bank

**Suggested phrasing:** "Open Settings > Billing, tap 'Update payment method', and add your new card or UPI. Complete any OTP step. If your bank declines, try a different card or contact your bank."

title: Refund and Partial Credit Policy
content:
CultPass is non-refundable after the billing cycle starts. Exceptions need support lead approval.
- Offer proration only if usage < 1 event and within 7 days of renewal
- For event-specific issues (canceled/rescheduled), offer credit equal to ticket value
- Document approval ID in the ticket log

**Suggested phrasing:** "Most CultPass plans are non-refundable after renewal. I can request a prorated credit if you've used fewer than one event within 7 days. If an event was canceled, I'll apply a credit equal to the ticket value."

title: Reschedule or Cancel an Event Reservation
content:
Users can reschedule/cancel via My Reservations.
- Tap the reservation > 'Change' or 'Cancel'
- Same-day reschedule allowed if slots available
- Premium/limited events may lock within 6 hours of start
- If event is canceled by organizer, auto-credit should apply

**Suggested phrasing:** "Open My Reservations, choose the event, then tap 'Change' or 'Cancel'. Same-day changes work if slots remain. Premium events may lock 6 hours before start. If the organizer cancels, we'll issue a credit automatically."

title: Device Compatibility and App Updates
content:
CultPass app supports Android 9+ and iOS 15+.
- Ask user to update to latest app version
- If crash persists, clear cache (Android) or reinstall (both)
- Capture device model, OS version, and app version for debugging

**Suggested phrasing:** "Please update the app to the latest version. If it still crashes, clear cache (Android) or reinstall. Tell me your device model/OS/app version so I can log it for engineering."

title: Two-Factor and Passwordless Login
content:
CultPass supports email magic links and optional 2FA.
- Magic link: ensure the user taps the latest link from their device
- 2FA: codes expire in 5 minutes; offer backup codes if enabled
- If user lost 2FA device, verify identity and escalate for reset

**Suggested phrasing:** "Use the newest magic link we sent and tap it on the same device. If you use 2FA, the code expires in 5 minutes-request a new one. If you lost your 2FA device, I'll verify you and reset access."

title: Manage Multiple Profiles or Family Access
content:
Users can add family members under Settings > Family.
- Up to 4 profiles per primary account
- Each profile gets its own QR for attendance
- Billing remains with the primary payer
- To remove a profile, primary must confirm

**Suggested phrasing:** "Go to Settings > Family to add up to 4 profiles. Each gets its own QR for check-in while billing stays with the primary account. To remove someone, the primary account holder must confirm."

title: Event Accessibility and Accommodations
content:
For accessibility requests:
- Check event details for wheelchair/assistive support
- If unclear, contact venue and add note to reservation
- Offer early entry where possible
- Document needs in ticket log for staff

**Suggested phrasing:** "I can check accessibility for you. If the listing is unclear, I'll contact the venue and add a note to your reservation for wheelchair or assistive needs. We can also arrange early entry when available."

title: Language and Communication Preferences
content:
Users can set language and notification preferences in Settings.
- Language changes affect app content and support replies
- Notification controls: email, push, SMS toggles
- Respect DND; keep critical alerts (event changes) enabled by default

**Suggested phrasing:** "You can change your app and support language plus notification channels in Settings. I'll note your preference and make sure critical event updates stay on."

title: Data Privacy and Export Requests
content:
CultPass supports GDPR-style requests.
- To export data, confirm account email and request type
- Typical fulfillment: within 7-14 days
- For deletion, warn about loss of history/reservations; revoke access after confirmation
- Log request ID and timeline

**Suggested phrasing:** "I can start a data export or deletion. Please confirm your account email. Exports complete in about 7-14 days. Deleting your data removes history and access-I'll proceed once you confirm."

title: App Performance Troubleshooting
content:
If the app is slow:
- Check network (Wi-Fi vs cellular); run speed test
- Clear cache (Android) or reinstall
- Disable VPN; check for system battery savers restricting background data
- If slowness persists, collect logs (time, action, device) and escalate

**Suggested phrasing:** "Please try switching networks, then clear cache or reinstall. If you use a VPN, disable it temporarily. If it stays slow, share the time/action and your device details so I can escalate with logs."
